1111.content: where is the new guy living
1111.title: village

11111.content: Your name is Ren and your just started out as a ninja when you graduated from the Ninja Academy. You're a 13 year old with short red hair and blue eyes. You wear a grey short-sleeved shirt with a lightning crest on the back of the collar and you wear some black pants with your blue sandals on your feet and your leaf headband on. You learned some ninjutsu and genjutsu while at the academy that helps you passed. You were heading straight for the training grounds when you spotted your good buddy
11111.title: leaf

111111.content:
You see the blonde ninja, Naruto, coming in your direction. You were surprised and glad that he passed and graduated to be a ninja. Though, there is something that has been bothering you about him. You've recently noticed that he carries the dreaded Nine-Tailed Fox spirit within him. It was the main reason why he was so hated by everyone in the village. Well, everyone except you, Shikamaru, Choji and even your parents. Unlike most adults, your parents never really hated the boy because they know that it wasn't his fault for the deaths of many lives in the leaf village. You overheard your parents one night saying that they wished to help Naruto. You were shocked by why he's being hated by everyone. At first, it made you angry to know that the villagers were punishing a boy who had nothing to do with the attack, but you know that taking it out on them will probably make things worse. You've been a good friend to him because you know that he deserves one. You go to him to say hello.

"Hey, Naruto." You said.

"Hey, Ren. What's going on?" Naruto asked.

"Nothing. Just gonna go meet my team. What about you?" You asked.

"I'm just thinking about how I should get Sakura's attention." Naruto said.

"You're still onto her? Naruto, I'm not gonna be a jerk here, but I think she only has her attention set on Sasuke." You said.

"She just needs to know that I'm not who she thinks I am. That way, she'll recognize me for sure." Naruto said.

"I'm just making sure that you won't feel hurt later on." You said in concern.

"Thanks, Ren, but I'll be fine. Believe it." Naruto said with confidence.

"Alright. Tell you what? Once your done with training and some missions, we'll talk about some plans. Okay?" You suggested.

"Sounds good to me! Well, I better get going. See you later, Ren." Naruto said before leaving you.

"Bye, Naruto!" You said while waving for him.

"Just be careful, Man. You're already suffering inside as it is." You thought with concern before leaving to meat your team.
111111.title: Help a friend in need

1111111.content:
You finished meeting with your teammates, Kai and Asuka, and doing some missions before decided to find Naruto. Your teammates decides to come with you. Kai is the same age as you only with long brown hair and green eyes. He wears a light purple shirt and blue pants with his headband on his left arm. Asuka is a kunoichi with long dark blue hair and light blue eyes. She wears a blue shirt with a dark red skirt with shorts coming from underneath it and wears her headband on normally. You guys wait for Naruto to come by at Ichiraku's for some ramen until he manages to show up on time.

"Hey, Ren! Nice to see ya again!" Naruto said before noticing Kai and Asuka. "Hey! I know you two! You're Kai and you must be Asuka, right?" Naruto wondered.

"That's right. Nice to see you again, Naruto." Kai said.

"The same goes for me." Asuka said.

"What brings you two here?" Naruto asked.

"Well, I was gonna see you to talk about our plans with Sakura, but they overheard me and decided to help out too." You explained.

"I just don't see why you like that pink jerk so much. I mean, all she does is drool over that arrogant Uchiha and belittles and hits you when things don't go her way." Asuka wondered with frustration.

"Well, she's smart and really cute. Just because she does that to me, doesn't mean that she really thinks that way about me." Naruto said.

"Well, okay. Now, let's talk about what we should do with her." You said.

"What do I have to do?" Naruto asked.

"There you are, Naruto." A voice said.

The four of you turned to see
1111111.title: A Plan For Sakura's Heart

11111111.content:
"Oh! Hi, Sakura! What's up?" Naruto asked.

"I'm here to tell you that Kakashi-Sensei wants us to be in the training fields in a few minutes for training. Don't be late." Sakura said.

"Sure thing, Sakura. Oh! Before you go." Naruto was then cut off by Sakura.

"No, Naruto! I won't go out with and never will. Now, just get going already." Sakura said coldly before leaving.

It hurts Naruto a little in his heart and he turns to face you and your friends. Asuka arched her eyebrow that says "you-see-what-I-mean?" all over her at him.

"Well, I guess we'll talk later. See ya guys." Naruto said a little sad before leaving.

"Ren. I'm getting worried about him. We have to tell him that Sakura's no good for him." Kai suggested.

"I guess your right. Let's go tell him." You said before you and your team leave after you paid for your meal.

You guys go to the training grounds to see Naruto
11111111.title: Sakura

111111112.content:
You and your friends see Naruto having a match with Sasuke and Sakura and Kakashi are watching them. You can see on Sakura's face that she's routing for Sasuke in this match as usual. You guys go down to see the fight with Kakashi.

"Hey there, Kakashi-Sensei. How's it going over here?" You wondered.

"Well, it's a Taijutsu match-up and right now Naruto has the upper hand against Sasuke. If he wins, it'll be a shocker to me." Kakashi said.

"He won't win because Sasuke will easily take him down." Sakura said still siding with Sasuke.

"Oh boy." Kai sighed.

"Seriously." Asuka said while rolling her eyes.

You guys turned to see Naruto still having the advantage over Sasuke. Sasuke tries to kick him back, but Naruto dodged and punched him in the jaw. Sasuke was still on his feet and manages to hit him back, causing him to fall on his back. Once he got back on his feet, Naruto sees Sasuke coming at him at full speed and manages to dodge another attack before knocking him down with his fist near his face.

"Well, I'll be. Good job, Naruto." Kakashi said.

"Thanks, Kakashi-Sensei!" Naruto said happily.

"That ends training for today. You may go home now." Kakashi said before he poofed away.

"I'll admit Naruto, that was actually fun. Next time, you won't be so lucky." Sasuke said.

"We'll see. What do you say? One more round?" Naruto challenged.

"Sure. Next time, though. For now, I'm going home." Sasuke said before leaving.

"Wait, Sasuke! Let me come with you!" Sakura called out while running towards him.

"No. I'll go by myself. I don't need you bugging me. Bye, though." Sasuke said before he disappeared.

You, Kai and Asuka go up to Naruto to congratulate him on his victory.

"That was good, Naruto." Kai said.

"Yeah! You were awesome." Asuka said.

"Thanks, Guys. Say, what are doing here, anyway?" Naruto asked.

"We'll, we need to talk to you about Sakura." You said.

"Hold on a sec. I'll be right back." Naruto said before going to Sakura.

As Naruto goes up to her, he failed to realize that Sakura doesn't look very happy. You can guess that things is not gonna end well for him.

"Don't worry, Sakura. I can go with you if you want." Naruto said.

"Why would I want an annoying, worthless and pathetic excuse of a ninja to be anywhere near me?" Sakura asked angrily.

"Wha-what?" Naruto asked in shock of her behavior.

"I don't want to be anywhere near you at all. All you do is make me feel miserable in front of Sasuke." Sakura said with venom in her voice.

"No I don't." Naruto said.

"Yes you do. In fact, you keep asking me out is really annoying too. When will you realize that I will never go out with you and no girl will ever go out with a demon like you!" Sakura yelled coldly.

You and your friends were shocked by her words at Naruto as he feels his heart being broken like glass at her yelling.

"Sakura." Naruto said still shocked.

"No! I don't want you to be anywhere near me again! So, do me a favor and go die in a ditch!" Sakura yelled before turning her back on him.

Naruto feels his emotions going out of control as tears starts going down his cheek. With that said, Naruto runs away while crying. You and your friends came out of the shock before turning towards Sakura with not so good looks on your faces. Sakura turns to see the angry looks on all of your faces.

"What?" Sakura asked.

"You see what you did now?" You asked not so pleased with her actions.

"He deserves it." Sakura said coldly.

"What do you mean he deserves it? He didn't do anything to you!" Kai said angrily.

"He hurt Sasuke!" Sakura said.

"It was a match! It was supposed to be that way!" Asuka yelled.

"I don't care! Now, that demon won't be in the way of me and Sasuke." Sakura said with coldness.

"There you go! Always about him, huh? I've got news for you, he feels the same way towards you as you do to Sasuke! Now, you just ripped out his heart and throw it away without a sense of regret! If anyone's worthless and pathetic, it's you!" Kai said with much anger.

"What?" Sakura asked in shock.

"He was trying to be nice to you and all you did was making him feel like a broken man because you want to be with Sasuke. Guess what? This isn't a fairytale, this is the ninja world and you're not fit to be one. If you want to be with him, then do all of us a favor and just quit! Because, as far as I'm concerned, you're nothing more than a heartless, sick, disgusting pink bitch!" Asuka yelled before leaving to find Naruto with Kai following her.

"I hope you're proud of yourself, Sakura. Try to think about what you've done." You said before leaving too.

Sakura just stand there with a bewildered look on her face. She them felt like she's been slapped in the face back to reality. Has she really been this cold towards Naruto? She doesn't know anymore as she starts crying.
111111112.title: The Match and Heartbreak

1111111121.content:
You, Kai and Asuka are at Naruto's apartment while he's in there crying his eyes out. After hearing what Sakura said to him, Naruto ran back home and locks the door behind him so he can cry in peace. Once you guys got there, you tried everything you can think of, but nothing worked. Ever since, you guys feel like his pain is gonna get worse of you all don't do something fast.

"Naruto? Come on. You've been in there crying for about 2 hours now. You can't stay in there forever." You said.as you banged on his door.

"Yes I can!" Naruto cried.

"Look. We understand that you're in more pain than you'd ever felt in your life, but we're just trying to help you. Come on out. We'll talk about this over some ramen." Kai said.

"Forget it! Even ramen can't help me now!" Naruto said.

"Let's face it, guys. This isn't getting us anywhere." Asuka sighed.

"Asuka's right, Ren. He looks like he wants to clear his head alone." Kai agreed.

"I just wished we had a new plan." You said.

"What's going on here?" A voice asked.

You guys turned around to see
1111111121.title: Healing A Friend's Heart

choices: Later, you guys go check on Naruto
11111111212.content:
You guys turned to see Sasuke coming to see what's happening here.

"Sasuke? What are you doing here?" Kai asked.

"I was minding my own business when I heard someone crying and, judging by the voice, I had a weird feeling that it's Naruto. So, you mind telling me why's he having a breakdown?" Sasuke wondered.

"You can thank Sakura for this. She said things that you wouldn't believe your ears after he was just trying to be nice to her." Asuka said.

"Oh boy. I always knew that she would take things too far one day. Let me try." Sasuke said.

Sasuke goes to knock on Naruto's door and hopes that he hears him.

"Go away." Naruto cried out.

"Naruto. It's me. Sasuke." Sasuke said.

"Sasuke?" Naruto asked.

"Yes. Listen, don't listen to what Sakura said. She doesn't know what she was talking about." Sasuke said.

"She does and she's right. How can anyone love someone like me?" Naruto said in pain.

"Come on, man. What happened to the Naruto that we all know? The guy that said he'll be Hokage someday? The one that never gives up and never goes back on his word? Where's that Naruto?" You asked in hope that'll lift his spirit.

"He died when my heart died." Naruto said silently.

"Ren. I think it's best if we give him some time." Kai suggested with his hand on your shoulder.

"Kai's right. I'll go see if I can talk some sense into Sakura. I'll see you guys soon." Sasuke said before leaving.

"We should go too, Ren. We'll come back later on to check on him." Asuka suggested.

"Okay. Naruto? We're leaving! We'll be back to check on you! You want us to bring you anything?" You asked.

"No. But, thank you. I just want to be alone right now." Naruto said with tears on his face.

"I understand. We'll see you soon, man." You said.

"See ya." Naruto said.

You, Kai and Asuka left Naruto's apartment so he could continue to poor his emotions out in peace.
11111111212.title: Sasuke's Assistance

111111112122.content:
After a while, you and your friends go back to Naruto's apartment to check on him with some containers of ramen for him to eat. Once there, you knocked on the door to let him know that you're back.

"Hey, Naruto! We're back and we brought you some food for you!" You called out.

There was no answer from him, though. You turned the knob to see that it's been unlocked, to your surprise.

"He unlocked his door?" Kai wondered.

"Something isn't right here." Asuka said.

"Naruto? You in here, buddy?" You called out.

You guys checked his entire apartment, but can't find Naruto anywhere.

"Looks like he's not here." Kai said.

"Where did he run off to?" You wondered.

"Let's check
111111112122.title: Later, you guys go check on Naruto

1111111121221.content:
You and your friends go to find Naruto at the training fields. You guys did find him, but you see him doing training in a very bad way. You see him doing punches on a log and his knuckles are bloody red. He doesn't seem to care though and that what's worrying you. You go up to him to see if you can call him down.

"Naruto? You okay, pal?" You asked with worry.

"What do you guys want?" Naruto asked in a bitter tone.

"We're just here to see if you're okay." Asuka replied.

"I don't need you to do that. Just leave me alone." Naruto said with a little anger.

"Naruto. Your hands are bleeding and it's covered with splinters. Come on. Let's get you fixed up." Kai suggested.

"No! I'm fine! Now, go away!" Naruto yelled a little

"We're just trying to help, buddy." You said.

"Buddy? That's a laugh." Naruto said with venom.

You and your friends gasped in shock to hear him say that.

"What-what do you mean by that?" You wondered as you believed that his broken heart maybe driving him over the edge.

"Since when did you guys ever considered of being my friends? You're just like everyone else in this village. Always treating me like an animal and putting me down. I've been through all of that everyday of my life. I became a ninja and help these people, but what do I get in return? Criticism and more physical abuse. After what Sakura said, I finally realized that I was doing all of this for nothing. To them, I'll always be nothing more but a demon because of the real one inside me." Naruto said with a lot of anger and venom.

"Naruto." Asuka said with sadness.

"I can't take this anymore. I want this pain to stop. Why does it have to be me? Why? WHY?!" Naruto cried to the heavens as red chakra starts coming out of him.

"Oh no. Naruto, stop!" Kai said.

As the red chakra comes out, you felt something in you that made you go to your knees. You clutched your heart and your eyes begin to glow purple.

"Ren? What's wrong?" Asuka asked in concern.

"The Nine-Tails. I can actually feel his wrath and for him trying to escape. The power in me is reacting to it's chakra." You said as you now glowing dark purple.

"My Kami! What do we do?" Asuka asked in fear of her friend's lives.

"I'm working on it." Kai said.

It was then that Naruto looks at you guys with red cat-like eyes, bigger whisker marks and with claws and fangs. You get up and you looked back at him with glowing purple eyes.

"AAAAAAAHHHHHH!!!" Naruto cried with red chakra.

"AAAAAAAHHHHHH!!!" You cried too with some dark purple energy surrounding you.

It was then that
1111111121221.title: Naruto's Emotions Goes Critical

1211321.content:
Your name is Lee, your age is 14 , you were part of the same clan as Sakon and Ukon from the sound ninja five. You actually look quite similar to them in appearance and clothing. You had fair-skin and straight, grey hair with a long bang that covered your left eye. You were average built, you had a good muscle tone. You had a black shirt under a brown tunic with long sleeves, and black skin-tight shorts. You wore black arm-warmers (which are mistaken for being part of your sleeves), traditional black shinobi sandals with calf-length leg warmers covered by bandages . You enjoyed torturing and toying with your opponents.

You are blessed with the same Kekkei Genkai as Sakon and Ukon, your abilities were slightly more powerful. This triggered Orochimaru's interest in you. He made you unconscious for months while he experimented on you. The results of his experiments was, that you were stronger and faster than an average Jonin level shinobi, your Kekkei Genkai was modified and made more powerful. With your kekkei genkai, you are able to merge and separate with anyone at will. You could generally use this ability to remain within someone's body where you could bring out some of your own body parts at will. As a result of the experiments ,you could achieve super fast fusion and fission of your cells .

You were very powerful in taijutsu and ninjutsu. You have an enormous amount of chakra and stamina.

Immediately after the death of the sound ninja five you were awoken by Orochimaru and was commanded to gather any Intel from the leaf village.
1211321.title: sound

12113211.content: You planned to eventually betray and kill Orochimaru, but you needed him to fulfill your hunger for power. You followed his orders and left the Sound Village. You were still new to your modified Kekkei Genkai . You finally arrived at the Hidden Leaf village. You were able to pass into the village undetected at night . You knew you had to hide yourself and remain undetected by the village. You felt a bit nervous about using your new abilities, but there was no other option. You stood on top of the Hokage's mansion and looked for your first host. Your host is ...
12113211.title: Continue with this story!

choices: You leave it there, you will have better fun.
121132111.content:
Your saw a pink haired girl and you followed her. You followed her home . She went to her room and you watched her through the window. Her window was large enough for you to climb through and was open. She took her pink Chinese dress and had a black sports bra underneath. This was your perfect opportunity to attack. When she was distracted putting her Chinese dress away. You quickly got into her room and behind her.

You pressed your hand firmly on her back and your cells in your hand immediately started penetrating her body. ' what are you doing ?! ' , she said. She couldn't move , her body became paralysed. You looked at her and said, ' You will become my host. ' . By the time you said that half of your body was inside. She looked scared and said, ' You won't get away with this. ' . 'But I already have. ' , you responded. You then pressed your head against her back and it slowly penetrated her and diffused inside her body. Your entire body was inside her. Your total amount of cells decreased. Your cells flowed freely through her veins.Your merge was a success. Some of your cells went to her brain .All you had to do was decide to remove the memory of you merging with her or not.
121132111.title: Sakura.

1211321111.content:
Lee didn't want her acting strange and causing suspicion . It would create unnecessary attention for him and the last thing he wanted was for the village to know he was there. So he decided to change Sakura's memories. He erased the memory of them meeting .

It was as if nothing happened to Sakura. She stood in her room confused for a bit and then continued with her usual ritual before she went to bed. She felt a bit weird as if see wasn't alone, but she pushed that feeling aside and went to bed because tomorrow is...
1211321111.title: You remove the memory

choices: They stayed longer at her home.
1211321112.content: ' Don't you dare tell anyone or I will kill you! ' , Sakura heard Lee's voice in her head. She immediately went to stand in front of the mirror in her room. She was terrified when she saw her abs slowly morph into Lee's face. His face was now on Sakura's stomach. ' I can do anything with your body that I want to . ' , Lee said. She tried to punch Lee's face, but his face disappeared before impact and she punched herself hard in her stomach. She fell on her knees holding her stomach. ' Next time you try something like that I will kill. ' , Lee said as his hand began to form around her heart. ' I can even generate my parts on the inside ... ' , he said and gave her heart a squeeze. Pain shot through her entire body, she grabbed her chest but it was no use. She could feel his fingers around her heart. ' Now you know how dangerous I am. Stand up! ' , he shouted in her head and she immediately got up with tears running down her cheeks. ' Now that I know you won't try anything let's have some fun. ' , Lee said.
1211321112.title: You leave it there, you will have better fun.

1211321122.title: Tenten

12113211222.content: Suddenly Lee spotted in the distance distracted...
12113211222.title: Someone else

121132112221.content:
Kurenai was wondering the streets . She was exhausted from an S-rank mission that lasted a few days. She was way too tired to pay attention to her surroundings. Her fatigue was easily spotted by Lee, he immediately knew that this was an easy target. He waited for a perfect moment to strike. She walked into an alley thinking it was a good idea and that it was a shortcut to her house. Lee sneaked up behind her and grabbed her from behind. He covered her mouth with hand and the other hand wrapped around her waist. Kurenai was too tired to react. Lee's body slowly turned into a liquid and began slipping through her skin until she was left standing alone in the alley. There appeared a wide smile across Kurenai's and suddenly changed into a tired expression. Lee decided it would be best if he hibernate for a while. Kurenai thought she fell asleep while walking and continued walking home.

Suddenly Lee woke up and saw Kurenai was busy with...
121132112221.title: Kurenai

choices: Help the Akatsuki and betray Orochimaru
1211321122211.content: Kurenai was well rested and locking horns with one of the fiercest duo. It was a standoff between the leaf and the Akatsuki. Next to her stood Asuma Sarutobi , the son of the third hokage . Her opponents was ready to strike at any moment. To make things worse it was two of the most dangerous members of the Akatsuki : Itachi Uchiha the murderer of his clan and Kisame Hosikage the tailess terror and the scurge of the mist. Lee quickly scouted out the whole situation and had to make a choice. Help the hidden leaf or help the Akatsuki. Helping the Akatsuki would mean he could finally betray and get his revenge on Orochimaru. Lee had to make his decision fast because Kisame was about to strike.
1211321122211.title: Readers choice

12113211222112.content: Kisame leaped forward grabbing the handle of his Shark Skin, and gave one powerful swing of his blade. Asuma some how managed to stop this monstrous blow with his blades. Asuma became immobilised because of all the force that was being pushed down on him by Kisame. Asuma was stuck, he looked at Kurenai and said " Are you just going to stand there ?! ". Kurenai was filled with fear, she stood there motionless. Lee immediately knew that this was his chance to act. Lee's cells that was floating around in Kurenai's body became active and began attaching itself to her body, combining his chakra with hers and taking control of her body. Suddenly Kurenai's body began making hand signs, she lost control and couldn't regain control of her body. ' I can't control my body! ', she shouted out to Asuma. Before Asuma could respond flames shot from Kurenai's hands . Lee pointed her hands towards Asuma, the flames engulfed his body and caused a huge explosion. Kisame leaped back dodging the explosion, but Asuma was not so lucky . He took the full force of the flames. Asuma stood there badly burnt, but alive . He collapsed on the flow . Kurenai burst into tears, but she was unable to help him. No matter how hard she tried to move, her body just wouldn't badge. Itachi activated his sharingan, he could clearly see the presence of Lee inside Kurenai. ' Who are you?', Itachi called out to Lee. Suddenly Kurenai's head slowly began to sink into her body. She panicked , but she couldn't do anything. Her head had completely sunk into her body , leaving behind her headless body. Then after a few seconds a new head began rising from out of her body. ' The name is Lee, and I want to join the Akatsuki... (He explained his whole life story ).' . They decided to take you to their leader . Lee wondered if he should keep Kurenai's body or leave it behind.
12113211222112.title: Help the Akatsuki and betray Orochimaru

121132112221122.content:
" Kurenai wasn't as strong as I thought. " , Lee said and began splitting with her . Kurenai dropped on the floor unconscious , Lee looked at her and said , " Till next time my Sweet . I still wanted to give your body a good feel up. " , Lee said and walked away . " That's some trick . " , Kisame said putting his massive blade on his back . " You will be pretty useful to the Akatsuki. " , Itachi added.
" I wonder if I shouldn't get a souvenir , maybe a gift for the Akatsuki , someone who knows the leaf inside and out . " , Lee said . " Do what you want, but we moving on ahead, we going after the nine tails Jinchuriki, catch up if you done with your precious gift . " , Kisame said and walked off with Itachi.
121132112221122.title: Leave Kurenai behind

1311111121121221112211.content:
Ken Uzumaki stared at his nephew and his guest as he stood alone in the training ground. “Good you are here. I’m surprised to see Hinata though I would have guessed that you would have asked Sakura,” he said. While inside his head he is dancing around in joy thinking his nephew finally got over that stupid crush.

“Well I did ask her but she told me no. I than ran into Hinata during lunch causing her to spill her food so I offered her some of mine. We talked for a bit and I asked her if she wanted to train with us today,” Naruto explained to his uncle.

“Okay then I guess we should start with what my ninjutsu style is. It is called the bondage style. The bondage style focuses on capture and interrogation. It uses the supplies you have to capture your opponent and has moves that can be used to get them to talk to you. This can be done through the methods of pain or pleasure of the target. It works best if the target is of opposite gender but can be used on the same gender as well,” he explained.

He then said, “Now Hinata could you turn around so your back is facing Naruto I am going to show him how to perform the first jutsu of this style.” She does as ordered and turns around. “Okay Naruto hold onto this rope and perform these hand signs,” he says as he does a pair of hand signs. “Then say wrist binding jutsu.”

Naruto nods his head and says, “Okay.” He then holds the rope and does the hand signs. “Wrist binding jutsu,” he says. The rope moves to wrap around her wrist but barley reaches her wrist before it fall to the ground.

“Nice try Naruto but this time I want you to put some more chakra in the rope and imagine the way you want the binding to look. Remember that book about shibari that I gave you for your birthday last year,” he said. This causes Naruto to blush a little because he remembered the book and how his uncle used it as a starting point to talk about the birds and the bees.

He nodded his head and tried the jutsu again. This time the rope went to her sides and wrapped around both of her wrist before it forced them together in a strict knot that gave little wiggle room. Hinata was surprised by this at first and let out a surprised yelp. She then tried to free her hands but found that the knot was to strong. She also tried to use her chakra but found herself unable to. “Why can’t I focus my chakra around my hands is this part of the jutsu,” she asked.

“No that is because we are using the rope that I use for my techniques and I have seals written all over the ropes that prevent others from using there chakra on the ropes. The seals are designed so only the castor will be able to remove the ropes. If something happened to the castor it would take 72 hours before the seals would deactivate. The seals would also prevent cutting of the ropes as well,” Ken explained. “That was a good job Naruto. Nice and tight with no way for her to slip out of it. Looks like you are a natural at this. Now let’s try its sibling jutsu. Here is another piece of rope and now use these hand signs as you say ankle bind jutsu,” he said as he handed Naruto another piece of rope and showed him the hand signs.

“Just watch uncle ken I’ll get this one on the first try,” he said. He used about the same amount of chakra he had used on the wrist jutsu and imagined a similar knot as well. “Ankle bind jutsu,” he yelled. The rope than shot towards Hinata’s ankles and wrapped them into a strong knot as well. The sudden knot caused Hinata to lose her balance and fall to the ground. Naruto quickly moved to catch her. When he did he helped her lay on the ground since it would be difficult for her to stand with her ankles tied together.

“I’m impressed that you pulled that off on your first try,” ken said. “Maybe you are just a natural at this. Now Hinata I am going to take Naruto to the side to talk about some other techniques. I want you to try to get free of the ropes okay.”

“Okay,” she said. Ken nodded his head and turned to Naruto and walked to the edge of the training ground with Naruto to discuss a few things with him. Hinata meanwhile tried to get her wrist or ankles free but found that the knots were too tight and could not find an opening in the seals that would allow her to loosen the ropes. Hinata was also trying to avoid the fact that being helpless at the hands of Naruto was causing her vagina to get wet with anticipation. She tried to shake some of the ideas of Naruto taking advantage of her in these situations.

Twenty minutes later ken came back with Naruto and said,” thanks for being the test dummy today. Would it be possible for you to return tomorrow so I can show Naruto some of the interrogation techniques that go with my style? I will ask a friend of mine to be here as well so I can use her as the example while Naruto does the same with you.”

She grows a blush on her face thinking about some of those interrogation techniques could be before she said, “sure I would love to.” He looked at her and had to hide the smile on his face. ‘I guess Hinata is the submissive type,’ he says in his head. He then calls Naruto back over. “Okay Naruto I am going to have you release her and then we will work on both of your conditionings and taijutsu till supper time. After that we will help Hinata home and head home ourselves. When we get home tonight I’ll teach you the seals that are placed on the rope. Here is the binding release jutsu. Which can also be used if you find yourself tied up with non-chakra suppressant rope,” he said as he showed both of them the hand signs for the jutsu thinking it will come in handy for the both of them.

After Naruto used the technique and freed Hinata Ken had them run laps around the training ground and spar for a bit as he gave advice to both of them while trying to give Hinata encouragement and boost her confidence. When they were done he offered Hinata supper at Ichiraku’s but she refused saying she had to head home.

“See you tomorrow Hinata-Chan,” Naruto said.

“Goodbye,” Hinata quickly said with red cheeks as she ran away.

After that Naruto and ken had a few bowls of ramen at Ichiraku’s before they went home where he had Naruto finish his homework before he taught him the seals that are placed on the rope and other equipment used in his style.

Description:

Pre-timeskip: 4' 7", jet black medium length hair, pale skinned, lightly toned with gunmetal blue eyes. On his back is a "tattoo" resembleing a karge pair of tribal wings framing a central kanji for "shadow" made of exposed shin surrounded by a solid black circle. Close inspection reveals small sealing signs flowing throughout the black surrounding the kanji. Usually wears a mesh armor shirt under a sleeveless black zip-up hoodie, standard ninja sandels, dark grey shorts with his weapon sachel strapped to the back favoring the left. Finally, his left hand and forearm is wrapped in a black bandage leaving his fingers exposed and he keeps a face mack wrapped around his neck. when pulled up and over his nose it shows a wicked depiction of fangs.

Post-timeskip: 6' 5", hair is now shoulder length with white strips all throughout, much more defined muscles and eyes have a white pupil. "tattoo" remains the same with the expectation of the kanji in the center is now black and the solid black circle surrounding it has disappeared. He wears a long hooded white trench coat (think 4th hokage's but with a hood) with black along all seams and edges, kept the mesh armor shirt, long black ninja pants, satchel in the same place, black bandage on left arms now extends up the entire arm, right forearm has a senbon holder for quick accessibility. Finally, has kept the face mask as well.

Elemental Affinities: Fire, Lightning, and Shadow (Blood line)

Usual equipment: Senbon needles (pre less then post), kunai knives (pre only), Katana and others to be revealed later.

Jutsu: Fire ball jutsu, lightning needles, Dragon Fire Bomb, Shadow Cloak, and others to be revealed.

Blood Line: Shadow Chakra. The kage clan was blessed from the beginning with two things by the Sage of Six Paths; 1. the ability to use and mold the shadows to thier whim, but only when the achieved peace with themselves. From birth, a childs shadow chakra is sealed, as such the kanji on thier back with surrounded by a simple black circle. every kage with the blood line is born with the kanji, a physical manifestation of thier chakra. when it is unsealed at age 10 the chakra forms into unique designs and forms, like Ryu's wings. Finally, 2. The last gift given to the Kage clan was the heart of Juubi, having taken the form of, arguibly, the most powerful Biju having gone unknown to his siblings and the rest of the shinobi world, the same Biju now sealed with in Ryu, the final legacy of his lost clan.
13111121.title: Ryuza Kage

131111211.content:
Black

That's all he could see, in every conceivable direction there was nothing but black. As deep as the darkest abyss and radiating hopelessness. He gulped and spun around, trying to find a way out.

That's when the smothing lonelyness reared it's head and he RAN. He ran as far and as fast as he could, trying in vain to escape the mounting despair. He must have run for hours, days, months, but the void swallowed all sense of time. The ache was starting to set, along with the fatigue. He panted as he fell to his knees and then fully to the ground when the weight of the despair, the hate, and the loneliness slammed down on him. Then, in a last ditch effort, he called for help. He screamed, as loud as he could...

And his call fell upon willing ears

His breath hitched as he watched the void shift and contort into an all too familiar form. He felt like crying in joy as the massive figure approached on 4 strong legs. the figure's eyes opened to reveal a pair of irises as white as snow and sporting slit pupils. The creature lowered it's head to his level and looked him in the eye

Ryu, it's time to wake up. it said, like a voice coming from the void itself and dripping with power, but underlined with care. Like a rush of air, Ryu was blown out of the abyss and into the waking world.

~(Kage compound, Main house)~

Just as the first rays of sunlight was alighting on the sweat covered body of a black haired boy did he shoot up straight in his futon panting as if having run a marathon not a moment ago. He looked around, taking in the familiar surroundings before sighing in releif and falling back on his futon, hands plastered against his face.

'How many times did that one make...?' He asked seemingly to himself, only to get the answer from his mental "roommate".

5, within just a few weeks. The fequency of these nightmares you have had the past year is starting to worry even me. said the now distinctly male voice from the depths of his mind. Ryu groaned as he sat up in his futon again.

'You don't have to tell me twice. I fucking hate these nightmares. I'm very tempted to spend my sleeping hours with you, Kai.' Ryu thought as he stood and headed to his wardrobe, pulling out his clothes and gear. A chuckle came from his roommate while he did so

While the offer is tempting and could be very interesting, i think you get enough of me during the day. Either way, i'll start keeping a closer eye on your mental state while your asleep so you don't have to call for me next time. Kai said in a serious tone tinged with amusement. Now go get ready, you have to see the hokage about entering the academy

'alright alright, calm down mom, i'm going.' Ryu thought sarcastically while heading toward the shower. After a quick wash he got dressed and left the main house. Ryu stopped and looked around the rest of the compound, only to bet met with the sight of the destruction that happened years ago. With sigh dripping with sadness Ryu started weaving the hand-signs for his favorite jutsu. "KAGE STYLE: SHADOW CLOAK JUTSU." He said as his form started to sink into the ground, right into the shadow beneath his feet. All that was left behind was a large round shadow on the ground that blasted off into the distance at blinding speed.
131111211.title: A Shadow's Reveal

1311112111.content:
While blazing through the forest surrounding konoha and subsequently the village itself, all anyone saw was a shadow, flickering at the edge of their vision. Ninja spun in hopes of finding the source while villagers simply took it as their mind playing tricks on them. Ryu sped through the streets and alleys towards the Hokage Tower until something caught his eye in the direction of the Hokage Monument. He stopped and went up to the top of a building, slowly lifting out of his shadow to his waist, leaving the rest "submerged". Ryu then took in the spectacle that was the cliff faces, not brightly colors while a certain blond worked on the 4th hokage's head via a pully.

'is that who i think it is?' he thought, physically and mentally deadpanning as he watched. He then hears a short laugh from his guest when he looked as well.

'Ha, yeah. Looks like Naruto is up to his old games again. I wonder how long it will take for the shinobi to... At that moment a brown haired flash whipped by in the form of a certain Chunin teacher going to reprimand Naruto. 'Nevermind, there goes Iruka. I wonder how long it takes him to catch Naruto this time.

'huh, odd how he didn't notice me though.' Ryu then shrugged and sunk back down into his jutsu, blasting the rest of the way to the Hokage's Office. He slipped into the lobby and up the shadowed stairs and under the door in the blink of an eye. A slip second later he was blending in seemlessly with a shadow in the corner of the room. Only the Hokage noticed the intrusion, if the quick flickering of the eye in his direction was any indication. The ANBU and civilian councillor ranting at the head of the village, on the otherhand, didn't.

"Lord Hokage, we must put an end to that brat's antics! This is the 10th time he has defaced the Hokage Monument! That dem-!" He was cut short by the sheer Ki given off by The Hokage.

"I'm sorry councillor, but I'm afriad that we'll have to cut this short. we can continue this conversation in the next council meeting, understood?" He said in a deceptively calm voice, but his eyes conveyed the barely held anger. The Councillor hastily nodded and fled out the door. The aging man sighed and pinched his brow before addressing the hidden child. "You can come out now" He called as out of the corner of the room, a boy emerged, clad in black and grey with hood and mask drawn over his face. ANBU, not having seen the potential threat, appeared and drew their blades on the boy. Ryu looked at the agents with a cold calculating glare. "Drop your weapons, he is a guest. You are all dismissed, i will call for you again afterwards."

All the assembled ninja nodded and sheathed their blades before Sushining out of the office, which aloud the Hokage to activate the hidden silenceing seals in the office. Ryu turned to him and gave a deep bow in respect.

"Lord Hokage, a pleasure to see you again. How are you?" Ryu asked as he straightened and set himself in a more comfortable position.

"I'm fine, my boy, just getting tired of all this paperwork and the civilian council's constant pushing toward more power for themselves, or in regard of action towards a certain jinchuriki we both know." Saratobi said as he took out his pipe. His guest chuckled to himself.

"Oh yes, Naruto. We actually saw him on the way here today, defacing the Hokage Monument yet again." He laughed as the man slowly cocked a brow in question at the mention of 'we'. "Forgot about my own tenant, it seems?"

"Ah, right. Apologies i'm still not used to having two Jinchuriki in the village, let alone one that no one knows about. How is he?" He asked while Ryu Rolled his eyes.

"Ask him yourself, i'm going to meditate for a few while you talk." Ryu said as he closed his eyes and relaxed visiblely before they opened again to reveal completely black eyes as he smirked at the Hokage.

"Hello, Lord Hokage. Ryu said in a voice far too deep for his body to create at the current time. "As for how i am, I'm perfectly fine. Ryu on the other hand, could be much better."

"Ah, hello, sorry i wasn't expecting an actual face to face conversation. But besides that, what do you mean? is something wrong with him?" Saratobi asked as he look a long drag of his pipe

"Physically, no nothing is wrong at all. But mentally, especially when he is asleep, he's in turmoil. While it's very subdued when awake, it manifests itself in his sleep as nightmares. The frequency of them has increased in the past year." Kai said as he sat cross legged on the floor. "I've decided to keep a closer eye on him at night after the last one.

"Do you believe he would need to go into the hospital or see someone about it?" The Hokage asked as he leaned on his desk.

"no no no, i'll be fine with him for awhile. if it gets any worse, i'll have him see one of the Yamanakas. Either way, we're here to get Ryu enrolled into the academy as a last year student. Kai held up a hand to stop the coming protest. "And you know very well that he is more then prepared for it. I've been training for years, as you know, and he's easily a low Chunin level Saratobi sighed in response and nodded

"fine, He starts next week with everyone else. If that is all, you are dismissed. Come by whenever you like, Ryu and it was a pleasure to talk to you Kai." He said as the boy nodded and thanked him at the same time, making an odd echo of voice as he disappeared again into his Jutsu.
1311112111.title: The office

13111121111.content:
( Hi everyone that may stumble across this thread, I'm just updating you to get rid of any confusion that may occur. I've changed the name of Ryuza's Clan to Seishin as opposed to the original Kage. I'll also try working in japanese honorifics and the japanese names for the villages, such as Konohagakure and Kumogakure. Mind you i'm still a novice so excuse any mistakes, thank you. Now then, on to the story!)

Just as the sun was breaking over the horizon, we join a certain scar-faced Chunin in the academy classroom, setting up papers and planning for the days events. Iruka believed in a simple little saying: "Prior planning prevents piss poor performance" or the "6 Ps", hence he was getting a head start and making sure everything was in order before the last year students arrived.

As he was organizing a few forms, he was suddenly joined in the room by an ANBU agent with purple hair and a feline mask. Iruka quickly turned to the ANBU in question and gave a polite bow. "Neko-san, to what do i owe the pleasure?" The ANBU held out a letter baring the Hokage's seal.

"Hokage-sama has asked i deliver this to you along with a message: 'be prepared for an interesting year'" With her package and message delivered, she disappeared in a flurry of leaves. Iruka's face became one of curiosity as he opened the letter, before contorting into one of confusion.

"hmmm... Ryuza Seishin. Why would Hokage-sama want to put this boy into a last year class? Though he does mention that he has prior training, it doesn't say how much and from who. Well, at least i'll be able to gauge his skills first hand later today..." He sighed as he disposed of the letter with a small Katon Jutsu and went back to preparing for the year and his mysterious new student.

~(Class start)~

As all the students were slowly finding thier ways into the classroom towards thier seats, they mingled casually, sharing stories from the break and catching up with friends they hadn't seen. The relative calm of the seen was broken when one Naruto Uzumaki burst in the door

"Haha! Just one more year and i'll finally be a ninja!" He shouted while wearing a large grin and making his way towards the end of the room and the ever brooding Sasuke Uchiha. "Just you wait, Teme! I'll show you i'm way better then you could ever hope to be!" Naruto continued on his mini-rant as he sat next to the emo prince who only spared his a side-long glare and a single thought.

'Hn, Dobe...' Sasuke went right back to his brooding. The class, after Naruto's outburst died down, went back to it's peaceful atmosphere. Again it wasn't destined to last as two kunochi's to-be burst into the room screaming. One was Blond hair blue eyed and dressed in deep purple clothing, while her suposed opponent was jade eyed and very peculiarly pink-haired. The girls were apparently having a race to see who would sit next to "Thier precious Sasuke-kun" and niether would say if the other won. This was the scene that Iruka walked in on before a very large tick-mark appeared on his head and used one of his favorite jutsu to calm the situation.

"SHUT UP AND SIT DOWN, YOU BRATS!" He screamed using his Big head jutsu. Everyone froze in place before instantly finding thier seats across the room. A winner seemed to be chosen as the pink haired girl sat down on the other side of Sasuke and the blond sat next to a boy who's black hair was done up to look like a pineapple. Iruka nodded as he stood in front of the class and cleared his voice. "Ahem. Very good, now that you are all seated, i'd like to make an announcement before class begins. We'll be having a new student join our class this year, so i expect you to show them the respect that a future comrade in owed." At this many in the class began to whisper to eachother, wondering who the new student was and where they were from and the like. Iruka turned to look at the door, having sensed being told that Ryuza was waiting just beyond threshold. "You may come in now."

Everyone instantly turned towards the door to see who would enter, even Sasuke showed interest in the new addition, wondering if they would be strong. The door slid open to reveal a boy in thier age group. He was wearing a black short sleeved zip-up hoodie, dark grey shorts with many pockets, standard blue ninja sandles and something wrapped around his neck. The things that drew everyone's attention were the fact that his hood was drawn to hide the upper half of his face and that his left hand, wrist and forearm was wrapped in a black bandage. The youth closed the door, walked to the center of the room and bowed to Iruka before turning towards the class.

"Everyone, I'd like to introduce your new classmate, Ryuza Seishin." Iruka said as he looked at Ryuza and politely asked him if he would remove the hood. He was given a "Hai, sensei." as Ryuza took off his hood to reveal black hair that was swept back and reached his neck. His eyes were a steely gunmetal blue that showed hints on interest as he looked about the room. "Thank you Ryu. Now, would you mind telling us a bit about yourself? likes, dislikes, hobbies, dreams, that sort of thing." Ryu nodded as he bowed toward the class.

"Good morning everyone. My name is, as you know, Ryuza Seishin. I'm functionally the last remaining member of the recently... Defuncted Seishin monestary to the west." There was a few gasps around the room and muttering about "another clan heir" and "functionally the last member". Ryu gave a sigh before regaining composer. "My likes are training, meditating, helping others and teriaki beef. My dislikes are arrogent self-centered people, seeing my friends in pain, and particularly loud noises. My hobbies include Cooking, meditating, training visiting my father in the hospital and tending to the monestary. Finally, my dreams are to find justice for my fallen clansmen, master my clan's sacred tools and Bloodline limit and to someday rebuild the Seishin monestary and clan so we may help any who need it for generations to come." With that he gave a deep bow to the class and looked at Iruka, who motioned for him to take a seat. Ryu opted to sit directly behind Sasuke, who had been watching him closely since he entered the room.

'I wonder if his interest in a good or a bad thing...' He though as he took his seat. Ryu of course noticed the looks he was receiving from some of the girls in the class. 'Ah, fuck. I think i have fangirls, juuuust great. He inwardly groaned as he heard the cackling of his tenant.

'Oh, i can already tell this is going to be a fun year!' Kai said as he laughed at his container's misery. Iruka took this moment to address the class.

"Now that everyone is here, i'd like to welcome you back to your final year here at the academy. Before we get into the lessons, myself and Mizuki-sensei, who is waiting outside, will be testing you on the basic ninja skills you have thus far, including shuriken and kunai throwing, the acedemy three and any other ninjutsu you know, as well as your taijutsu in one-on-one spars. This will be done to gauge your skills and rank you in the class anew, in case anyone improved over the break. We'll be starting with your Shuriken and kunai throwing. Please follow me down to the training fields." As he said that everyone stood and followed him out, Ryuza took up the back so he could keep an eye on everyone and keep a certain pineapple headed boy from lagging too far behind the rest.
13111121111.title: Introductions

131111211111.content:
When the class arrived at the training grounds outside the academy, a new face could be seen. This was Mizuki, the light blue haired assistant teacher Chunin. He gaze a curious look at the newly arrived Seishin but giving a barely noticeable look of disgust towards Naruto. Ryuza saw this and cocked his head ay the Chunin

'Distain towards the Kyuubi it seems. I have to wonder what else my fellow demon container has experienced.' Thought Ryu as he and the other students lined up before boxes of kunai and shuriken as instructed by Iruka-sensei.

From what i heard in my time with your clan, the lives of the other 9 were nowhere near as good as ours. While constaining me at the monestary was considered an honor, elsewhere it was a curse and as such the others were treated as outcasts. It seems Kyuubi's is no different. That poor boy. Kai sighed within the mindscape and receded back to watch the proceedings of the tests.

"Alright everyone, the tests will go as follows; first is the accuracy test. You'll each throw 5 shuriken and 5 kunai at the designated targets. You will points for each successful hit and bonus points for bullseyes. The girls will go first then the boys. After that will be the jutsu test in which you all will attempt to preform the three jutsu we teach here at the academy as well as any other jutsu you may learned away from class. Finally, the last test will be the taijutsu tournament." Iruka explained in front of the assembled students, getting nods and looks of both boredom and excitement at the coming tests. "Alright, we'll begin with the accuracy test. Ladies, please come up and grab 5 shuriken and kunai from the boxes. One at a time, come up, and throw at the target when you are ready." With this all the girls went and collected thier weapons before throwing.

The girl with navy blue hair and pale lavender eyes, Hinata Hyuuga, got 6/10 with 2 bonus points for two bullseyes.

Ino Yamanaka scored 4/10 with no bonus, only to yell at the the pink haired girl that she should try to top that.

Sakura Haruno, the pink haired girl from earlier, scored equal to Ino much to her dismay. She gave a strangled yell which caused everyone to flinch while Ryu and the boy with shaggy brown hair and triangle tattoos on his cheeks covered thier ears to lessen the pain. The rest of the civilian girls scored 3/10 on average.

The boys then followed suit and the results are as follows.

Kiba Inuzuka, the aforementioned triangle faced boy, scored equal to Hinata with 6/10.

Choji Akimchi, a rather rotund boy, scored 5/10 with one bullseye

Shikamaru Nara, the lazy pineapple haired boy got 6/10 but it was obvious he could have done better.

Naruto Uzumaki, though most likely spelt as Maelstrom the other spelling gave Ryu and Kai a little bit of a laugh. He scored 5/10 just barely before challenging the Uchiha to do better.

Sasuke Uchiha, the ever brooding "prodigy" scored a steller 8/10 with 4 bullseyes, much to the delight of his fangirls.

"Very good Sasuke, now Ryuza, please come up and show us what you have." Iruka said, grabbing the attention of everyone. They all wanted to see that the new kid could do and where he stands. Ryuza nodded and grabbed his weapons, throwing them up and down and spinning them on his fingers to test thier weight and balance. Satisfied, he walked up the line and stared at his target. He threw three shuriken at once, quickly followed by the other two. The first three landed dead center while the other two shuriken ebbed deep into the target on either side. The Kunai soon followed, two hit the bullseyes while two others stuck just as deep and the final one missed by a very narrow margin. 9/10 with 5 bullseyes, exemplary for a fresh to the academy student. Ryu breathed out as he turned to at shellshocked Iruka, bowed and returned to the line of equally shocked classmates. The Seishin chuckled to himself while his tenat laughed heartily.

'I think we broke them' They thought and laughed more as the others recovered. Almost immediately afterwards, the poor boy was set upon by the Yamanaka and Haruno, screeching about how he had cheated and that "there was no way that you could better than our Sasuke-kun!" The volume was starting to cause the Seishin great pain and even greater irritation. After about a minute of the screeching, Ryu and Kai both had had enough and expressed it in the best of ways, with in a voice that was chillingly calm, it struck the girls to thier very cores.

"Ladies. I'm only going to say this once. No, i did not cheat, yes i beat the Uchiha, no there is nothing either of you could possibly do to change that. Now you will both kindly shup your mouths and leave me be, lest you become my next target. Am i understood?" Ryu asked as he glared deeply into both thier eyes. The hurriedly nodded thier heads and retreated away from the frighteningly calm new arrival. With that settled, Iruka shrugged off the feeling suspiously like Killing Intent and regathered the attention of his students.

"Well, after that amazing performance, I'd say it's time to move on to the jutsu test. Do we have any volunteers to start us off?"
131111211111.title: The first test of a budding shinobi

You went to her office and there sitting behind a desk was the beautiful fifth Mizukage. If you continue with your stupid revenge, I will have no choice but to brand you a rogue ninja. So will you give up on vengeance? ' You thought for a moment and then with a grin on your face replied...
13113222111.title: Stick with this awesome story

choices: Did you take the mizukage with you.
131132221111.content: 'Then there is no other way, forgive me. ',she said leaping out of her chair and on to her desk. She then blew a red hot liquid at you. You recognised her jutsu as her lava style. You immediately knew you had to counter her jutsu, the radius of her jutsu was to wide for you to evade. You leapt backwards doing a few hand seals. You ran out of space and hit the door of the office with your back. The lava was coming faster towards you. You were done with your jutsu in the nick of time. You immediately spit out an enormous amount of water at the floor in front of you. You shouted , 'water style water wall. ' as the water began to make a wall in front of you. The water shielded you from the lava. The office room filled with steam as your water wall countered her lava. The mizukage gave a slight grin as she stared at you from on top of her desk. You sliced through the window and made your escape.

13113222111121212.title: I refuse to be part of your sick games !

131132221111212121.content:
Orochimaru began to laugh again. Suddenly another Orochimaru appeared behind you. Before you could react he bit you in the neck . You felt you whole body go numb. ' She will have to do. ', you said to yourself as you sneaked closer. When you were close enough you began to inspect the Kunoichi. She had light brown, pupil-less eyes. Her hair - black with a violet tint and styled in a short, spiky, fanned-ponytail. She had on a fitted mesh body suit that covers her from her neck down to her thighs. Over this she wears a tan overcoat with a purple in-seam and a pocket on each side, a dark orange mini-skirt, a dark blue belt, and pale grey shin guards.

You then decided it was time to strike. You casted your hidden mist Jutsu, the surroundings became covered by a blinding mist. She immediately pulled out a kunai from her pocket and holded it up in front of her. You began to make Hand signs that you learned from the scroll Orochimaru gave. You activated a forbidden Jutsu. You then slowly walked towards Anko, she couldn't see you in all this mist. You sneaked up behind and thought you were undetected by her. Just before you were about to grab her she rapidly turned around and out of her right sleeve shot five snakes at you. Each of their fangs sinked into your flesh. ' Got you! ', she shouted . You were caught off guard by her snake senses that was able to detect you . Out of your wounds began to leak a strange kind of water. You felt how your body began to change into water. ' If this is a water clone, then where is the real you. ' , she asked herself looking around. This was no water clone your entire body became water . You immediately began to manipulate your water form, you quickly covered her entire body with your water form. It was as if she was trapped inside a water bubble. You then forced yourself into her mouth and down her throat, her body became numb as you entered her. When all of you entered her body she dropped to her knees and began gasping for air. ' Get ... out... of ... my body. ', she said coughing. She could feel you slowly evading her mind and taking control of her body. She then got up to her feet with a new conscious . Her body gave a slight grin as it picked up the executioner blade.

You waited for her at the inn. It took two days for her to arrive. You heard knocking on your room door and when you opened the door there she was standing in the doorway. You examined her well, Pakura was a fairly tall kunoichi. She was fair-skinned with pupiless brown eyes. She had green hair that she tied in a bun on top of her head with a hair needle running through it and one short and long strands of hair with orange tips framing each side of her face. ' I'm really tired. ' , she said in a joyful manner. You let her in and she immediately made her way to your bed. She took her cloak off and tossed it on the floor. You then saw that she was wearing, Her attire consists of a sleeveless, backless top and short tight pants, with two lapels on the front and the back. She wears an obi around her waist, as well as purple arm-warmers which extend up to her shoulders, and has bandages around her tights and ankles. She then made herself comfortable on your bed.

You didn't expect her to have such a carefree personality. ' We can go hunt tail beasts tomorrow. ' , She said. You agreed with her and you knew she needed her rest. ' Why did you join the Akatsuki? ' , You asked. Her happy attitude became serious when she said, ' The Sand Village fed me to the Mist village . I agree with the cause of the Akatsuki. ' . For the rest of the afternoon you two shared stories about yourself.

13211.content:
This will be before the timeskip but right after the preliminary round

Meet Anna. She is a 14 year old girl who is the long lost sister to Ino who got sent to a different world as a baby, leaving Ino without a sister by her father as her mother didn't want her husband to do that. Years later, she got transported back home with no memories of her family at all. 3 days before the ninetails attack on the hidden leaf village, Ino's and Anna's father order to stop Anna since he feared about Anna finding out she is a jinjuriki of the six tails. So, after Anna stopped the attack, she gets frozen in a crystal for years. After 10 years, Anna gets released with the help of her friend, Naomi Jones. Anna is a Genin before this for your information so, yeah. They get the same sensei as Naruto, Sakura and Sasuke until someone was available to be a sensei to them. Anna wears a shirt, similar to Sakura's but in a blueish pink color and red shorts that go down to her knees as she has black hair. Anna just learned from Ino, the mind transfer jutsu and her main elemental jutsu's are Water, Wind, Fire and Earth.
